text:
Question 78) Possible MH370 Flight route from Malaysia Airlines before the fall, in 2014 Madagascar 2 500 km Indian Indian Ocean Australia Perth Possible route before the local fall where the wreckage were spotted Indonesia Malaysia Kuala Lumpur Last contact considering that the distance between the Place where the wreckage of the plane were sighted and the city of Perth is 2 cm, the approximate scale of this cartographic representation is:
A) 1: 12 500.
B) 1: 125 000.
C) 1: 1 250 000.
D) 1: 12 500 000.
E) 1: 125 000 000.
